projects.name: MeetBridge
projects.description: A MeetBridge project is a video conferencing application designed to replicate the core features of Zoom. It typically includes functionalities like real-time video and audio communication, chat, screen sharing, and meeting scheduling. The project aims to provide a seamless virtual meeting experience for users, enabling remote communication and collaboration.
